Posts.Content: GET OFF TE SUGAR: EVERY cell needs it tilive and grow,including cancer cells. My doctorrecommended Stevia. I get it at Publix/Kroger.It taste just like sugar and I cannot tell the difference. Also look up Flaxseed. US and European studies. Flaxseed iis on of the top 3 cancer protocolsin Europe and ENgland. I love it.Sprinkle on my salads,cottage cheese,potatoes,tomatoes,etc. INVESTIGATE.Good luck Sherry.
Posts.Title: How do I start the change?

Posts.Content: Honey were you taking estrogen/pregesterin or just estrogen alone? This is the big question. first: call your doctor and find out the eact dosage and if BIT hormones were being given to you,second pay attention-you have the right under federal law to et the office tofax you a copy of that origional 16 year priscription. i took it an dit grew inside me for over 10 uears and i did not know it. now:get on the internet and start looking for a good lawyer. I can recomend one but you will have to e mail me for info sherrykligman@hotmail.com.Good luck,Sherry.
Posts.Title: I had breast cancer

Posts.Content: Today my doctor started me on Femara(Letrozole).2.5mg once a day. I have elected NOT to have breast surgery and my cancer is ER/PR positive3+/4. I have never heard of this drug. Is anyone out there taking this drug an does anyone know of the  problems if any. I was told the cancer is lying on the prectus and rib cage. I have a bad heart so surgery is our for me. Any info gals? I sure would appricate it. Blessings,sherryk.
Posts.Title: New Drug Info please

Posts.Content: Morning.I just read your message.Although you are very frightened, you have now just joined the club with the greatest bunch of women you will ever get to know. And wow,dothey KNOW their stuff. I have had estrogen positive cancer for over 10 years, but I did not know it till the lump showed up inmy r breast in May 2007.NOW THINK ABOUT THAT STATEMENT.If you have estrogen pos/progestrine+ BC it is very,very slow growing. Mine is the size of a small egg and I have not elected surgery yet till I get All THE INFO i CAN. wHEN THE DOCTORS FIRST TOLD ME"sHERRY,YOU HAVE CANCER AND YOU must GET TO SURGERY now", i FREAKED. bUT MY WONDERFU HUSBAND SAID SOMETHING VERY WISE TO ME AND THE DOCTORS:'WITH ALL DUE RESPECT,SIR, IF THIS "THING" HAS BEEN GROWING INSIDE MY WIFE FOR 10+ YEARS, WHATS THE HURRY? It was the best question I have ever heard. What you have is time,time,time. DO not settle for just one doctors advise. Get another,and another, in another town, in another state, just get another. I did an dit is saving my life.
Posts.Title: "2 Hard Nodes, In Soft Tissue, Possible Breast..."

Posts.Content: You ar MORE than welcome, and remember,YOU HAVE THE FEDERAL right to have a copy of ALL lab test and a written copy of your mammogram. I have mine and I am sure all the women onthis board do also. Get them,(ask the nurse to make a quick copy on the copy machine) and get a folder and keep ALL your info in there. I named my folder" Sherry,s Breast Info". I NEVER leave home without it. LOL Blessings,Sherry. PS you can e-mail me at --Message edited by CancerCompass staff. For personal protection, email address removed. Consider private reply. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html--I am located in Georgia.
Posts.Title: "2 Hard Nodes, In Soft Tissue, Possible Breast..."
I took Estrogene alone..lawsuit or not?

Posts.Content: I am working on all this info with an investigation team/attorney as we speak. Look  for more amswers in about two weeks as this si a class-action site from what I understand. Thnaks.
Posts.Title: I took Estrogene alone..lawsuit or not?

Posts.Content: Hello, I am a 58 year old women. I have breast cancer/Estrogen rec positive. I have elected NOT to have surgery and NO chemotherapy , but I may consider some kind of Horomone therapy.Like you I am a Christian . I DO understand and I stand at your back. Love,Sherry.
Posts.Title: Do Not Want a Mastectomy

Posts.Content: Well you asked for an honest answer here goes: If I had that kind of agressive cancer with only a 10-20% of survival rate, I would choose to die frothe cancer and not the horrible chemicals.They know she will not survive anyway. But hey, thats just me.My prayers are with you and your Mom. FYI-my dad had the same cancer and my sister and I have BC. Blessings for your courage.
Posts.Title: Breast to Lung Cancer
